settings.title: EXCHANGES & RETURNS
settings.subtitle: At Zero Restriction we will gladly accept returns of any non custom-embroidered for an exchange or a full refund within 30 days of purchase.

settings.textarea: We will accept returns of any non custom-embroidered for an exchange or a full refund within 30 days of purchase.
All returns are subject to a $10 processing fee, which will be deducted from your refund amount.
Returns are processed within 14 business days after receipt. Once inspected and approved.

settings.richtext:
Zero Restriction will gladly accept returns of any non custom-embroidered for an exchange or a full refund within 30 days of purchase.

Return Processing Fee: All returns are subject to a $10 processing fee, which will be deducted from your refund amount.

Zero Restriction cannot accept any returns or exchanges on international orders, including orders to Canada.

Please visit our  Return Center  to obtain a return shipping label.

Please allow up to two weeks to process returns.

Zero Restriction cannot accept any returns or exchanges from other vendors who sell our product third party.

For additional questions relating to Zero Restriction's return or exchange policies please reach out to our customer service team at (833) 511-0991

settings.title: Contact us
settings.des: For additional questions relating to Zero Restrictions's return or exchange policies please reach out to our customer service team

settings.rte:
Zero Restriction will gladly accept returns of any non custom-embroidered for an exchange or a full refund within 30 days of purchase.

  • Full refund or exchange available
  • Non custom-embroidered items only
  • Original condition required
  • Direct purchases exclusively

All returns are subject to a $10 processing fee, which will be deducted from your refund amount.

  • Flat $10 fee per return
  • Automatically deducted from refund
  • Covers processing and handling
  • Applied to all return requests

Zero Restriction cannot accept any returns or exchanges on international orders, including orders to Canada.

  • US domestic orders only
  • Canada explicitly excluded
  • No international returns accepted
  • Policy applies to all regions

Visit our online Return Center to obtain a prepaid return shipping label and track your return status.

  • 24/7 online portal access
  • Instant label generation
  • Real-time tracking updates
  • Automated processing system

Please allow up to two weeks from receipt to
process returns.

  • Up to 14 business days
  • Email confirmation sent

We cannot accept returns or exchanges from third-party vendors who sell Zero Restriction products.

  • Zero Restriction direct only
  • No third-party vendor returns
  • Verify purchase source
  • Original store purchases required

settings.title: Return Guidelines
settings.subtitle: Please note that shipments and returns are not fulfilled on weekends or public holidays.

settings.top_info:
Customer Service

For additional questions relating to our return or exchange policies, our dedicated team is available to assist you.
